Github Profile Search

About this project

This page uses the Github API(https://docs.github.com/en/rest/reference/users#get-a-user) and Axios to fetch users. It is going to search for the Github users to get some of their profile data and their repositories when the search term is typed in. You can visit the repositories by clicking the repository names on the card.
